channel.title: Adding new colour. Need some extra eyes on this one [ Delta ]
channel.description:
This is both client and server sided , so I posted here because its more viewable than "client help" section.
Anyway , i was wondering how could i add a new color , for example: @pur@ ( meaning - purple )
There are many colours like @blu@ , @gre@ , @yel@ and so on.
How can i add this one?
